key_context.summary: Troy leaving to return to classes after working on Good Chop, Fede transitioning from everyplate team to Consumer alliance after 6+ years. Both received appreciation from team members.
key_context.relevance: Team composition changes affecting knowledge transfer and relationships

key_context.summary: Max on sick leave through Thursday with medical tests, then dealing with family bereavement requiring frequent time away from laptop to support wife.
key_context.relevance: Impacts team capacity and project timelines

key_context.summary: Factor and Youfoodz launching on unified app, requiring R16 ground floor desk space for 2 months. Team working on-site to support launch.
key_context.relevance: Major product launch requiring office space reallocation and team coordination

key_context.summary: Deo celebrating 1 year anniversary with contributions to Good Chop, Funnel, and OTP. Maria's birthday recognized for her work on The Pets Table.
key_context.relevance: Team morale and recognition of individual contributions

key_context.summary: Questions about Contentful usage for HelloFresh Web/App (likely only for Landing Pages). Team uses Applanga and Localize for content management.
Company approved special Christmas time off as recognition for team's effort throughout 2025.

summary: New Ventures team experiencing transitions with departures (Troy, Fede), personal challenges (Max's illness and family bereavement), while celebrating milestones (Deo's 1-year, Maria's birthday) and coordinating major initiatives including ABBA unified app launch and team swag orders.
